attributes.action: Build a vehicle bridge in Greenwich as an alternative to the Blackwell tunnel
attributes.background: The Blackwell tunnel in the east of London is getting worse for traffic culminating in the closure of the tunnel for 10 hours this month. There are breakdowns daily adding to the grief of everyone. Should there be a terrorist attack on the tunnels the whole of the east side would be crippled.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. It is the responsibility of the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/mayor-assembly/london-assembly/take-part/petitions
